QuestData.Title: Mysterious Soul Mirror
QuestData.Description:
<A shimmering soul mirror draws your attention on Devos's corpse.
Peculiar that she would keep one on her person. Perhaps Thenios will want to see this.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Mysterious Soul Mirror to Thenios at the temple in the Eonian Archives.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with Thenios in the Eonian Archives.
